item.title: alpine命令简介
item.description: alpine命令简介 Alpine Linux 包管理－apk包管理命令 apk –help apk update apk upgrade #升级软件 apk add openssh openntp vim apk add –no-cache mysql-client apk add docker –update-cache –repository http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/alpine/v3.8/main/ –allow-untrusted apk add asterisk=1.6.0.21-r0 apk add ‘asterisk<1.6.1’ apk add ‘asterisk>1.6.1’ apk del openssh openntp vim apk add –upgrade busybox #

item.title: LXC容器Alpine新系统配置
item.description: LXC容器Alpine新系统配置 （以alpine 12为例） 替换源sed -i 's/dl-cdn.alpinelinux.org/mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/g' /etc/apk/repositories apk update && apk upgrade 安装scpapk add openssh-client 安装时区设置apk add tzdata 复制上海时区
